vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 1933 for the sale of alcoholic beverages in conjunction with a general merchandise or food store 3,500 square feet or less on property zoned an MU-1-D-1 Mixed Use District with a D-1 Liquor Control Overlay, on the southwest corner of South Zang Boulevard and West Suffolk Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period with eligibility for automatic renewals for additional five-year periods, subject to amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period with eligibility for automatic renewals for additional five-year periods, subject to amended conditions  
Z234-113(MB)
